title: Kalimba De Luna
lyrics: In the land of the sunshine People know how to groove Making emotions Believin' in what they do Ka limba De Luna Take me tonight Show me the way To get right on time E. O. U. A. - on the rhythm Gente li ta los E. O. U. A. - on the rhythm Gente li ta los Ka limba De Luna Ka limba De Luna Ka limba De Luna Ka limba De Luna Ka limba de sol Please talk to me Lying is my life Be lievin' in what you say Hey he he he heeeeeeey oooh oh oh E. O. U. A. - on the rhythm Gente li ta los E. O. U. A.
